content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warning: "no ingredients to smelt"; fuel inventory contains 2 units of coal and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER; research set to automation; electrical_id updated to 7680.
- ElectricityGroup (id=7680) connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points: (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15° (199.998 units reported); connection points: (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output point: (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system updated to [27972].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point: (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system updated to [27972].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27972 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27973 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27974 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27979 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27978 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27983 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27982 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=27985 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Repeated Connection Attempts with Incorrect Fluid System Identifiers:
  - Multiple connection attempts using fluid_system IDs [26940, 26983, 27026, 27069, 27112, 27155, 27198, 27241, 27284, 27327, 27370, 27413, 27456, 27499, 27542, 27585, 27628, 27671, 27714, 27757, 27800, 27843, 27886, 27929] have failed. Validate and use an active fluid system identifier prior to each attempt.

• Inadequate Pipeline Readiness Verification:
  - Relying on a fixed 10‑second delay for pipeline stabilization has consistently resulted in unsuccessful connection attempts. Employ dynamic connectivity checks to confirm pipeline readiness before initiating connection sequences.
